text: Robert Williams (born 1951) is a Welsh Anglican priest. He was the Archdeacon of Gower from 2000 to 2016.Church in Wales Williams was educated at the University of Wales Bangor and St. Michael's College, LlandaffCrockfords (London, Church House, 2008/9) p 895 and ordained in 1976.ABF He held incumbencies at Reynoldston and Denbigh before his appointment as Archdeacon. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Alumni of St Michael's College, Llandaff Category:Alumni of Bangor University Category:Archdeacons of Gower Category:Living people
title: Robert Williams (Archdeacon of Gower)
